name: PlayerTurn3
_source: speak;CherryYoung;Ugh... See! Lost! Where are w-we going?
speak;SkillYoung;Well I'd be able to know where I'm going if you gave me the map!
speak;CherryYoung;Because that went so well earlier...
speak;SalYoung;Uhm, can we stop arguing?{br}Cherry, I have something to tell you...
speak;SkillYoung;Sorry ladies, but that can wait. Look over there! We should save them!
speak;SalYoung;Well, I suppose we should help... Honestly, who is causing trouble at this time?
